abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Youth Employment
            Support Project for Sierra Leone is to increase short term
            employment opportunities and to improve employability of
            targeted youth. Extension of the project closing date is
            from December 31, 2014 to June 30, 2015. Amendment of the
            authorized category of eligible expenditures to include
            operating costs under the disbursement category two of the
            Financing Agreement. The extension was officially requested
            by the Government, in a letter dated June 9, 2014,
            explaining that the current closing date was too short for
            completion of project activities. The Ebola outbreak further
            disrupted project implementation, necessitating extension of
            the closing date. Furthermore, the extension will also allow
            for completion of the impact evaluation of the skills
            training component (component two) of the project.
